name: Iman chakraborty
description: Introducing Iman Chakraborty, With a captivating stage presence and powerful vocals, Iman has enchanted audiences across the globe. Stay tuned for upcoming performances by Iman Chakraborty in Oikyotaan.

name: Snigdhajit Bhowmik
description: Introducing Snigdhajit Bhowmik, a talented singer with a powerful voice and deep understanding of Indian classical music. Collaborating with renowned musicians and composers, Snigdhajit has performed at various concerts and festivals globally. Discover his soulful music and stay tuned for his upcoming performance in oikyotaan.
